Functions
Clone
CRefObj<IShader> CShader::Clone(
ID3D11Device* pDevice

See IShader::Clone

ComputeParamSize
uint32 CShader::ComputeParamSize(
ShaderParamDef* pDefs,
uint32 numParams,
std::map<std::wstring, ShaderParamInstance>& params
)

Parses the definitions of each shader parameter that was read from the HLSL (using ParseShader.exe). For each definition we will compute the offset of the parameter within the constant buffer. This is used later when updating the constant buffer.

Parameters
pDefs
ShaderParamDef*

List of shader definitions defining each parameter.

numParams
uint32

Number of parameters in params

params
std::map<std::wstring, ShaderParamInstance>&

Parameter list we will copy definitions into

PushConstants
void CShader::PushConstants(
IRenderer* pRenderer,
SBuffer* pBuffer,
std::map<std::wstring, ShaderParamInstance>& params
)

Pushes each shader parameter into the D3D11 constant buffer.

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

D3D11 device/context to use

pBuffer
SBuffer*

Constant buffer to push values into

params
std::map<std::wstring, ShaderParamInstance>&

List of parameters to push

PopBuffers
void CShader::PopBuffers(
IRenderer* pRenderer,
std::map<std::wstring, ShaderParamInstance>& params
)

PopBuffers copies GPU buffers back to the CPU (after a compute shader has written to them).

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

D3D11 device/context to use

params
std::map<std::wstring, ShaderParamInstance>&

list of shader parameters

PushBuffers
void CShader::PushBuffers(
IRenderer* pRenderer,
std::map<std::wstring, ShaderParamInstance>& params
)

Pushes buffers from the CPU to the GPU (for instance, from a CPU buffer to a GPU structured buffer).

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

D3D11 device/context to use

params
std::map<std::wstring, ShaderParamInstance>&

List of parameters to push

Dispatch
void CShader::Dispatch(
IRenderer* pRenderer,
int xThreads,
int yThreads,
int zThreads
)

Runs the compute shader associated with a Caustic shader.

Parameters
xThreads
int

number of threads in X

yThreads
int

number of threads in Y

zThreads
int

number of threads in Z

BeginRender
void CShader::BeginRender(
IRenderer* pRenderer,
IRenderMaterial* pMaterial,
std::vector<CRefObj<ILight>>& lights,
DirectX::XMMATRIX* pWorld
)

BeginRender is called before rendering using this shader occurs.  This call is responsible for setting up the pRenderer device to use the shader.

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

D3D11 device/context to use

EndRender
void CShader::EndRender(
IRenderer *
)

EndRender is called after rendering using this shader occurs.  During this call the shader may clean up any state/memory it needed

Parameters
pRenderer

D3D11 device/context to use

GetShaderInfo
CRefObj<IShaderInfo> CShader::GetShaderInfo()
Returns

Returns information about the shader

CreateBuffer
void CShader::CreateBuffer(
ID3D11Device* pDevice,
uint32 bufSize,
uint32 bindFlags,
uint32 cpuAccessFlags,
D3D11_USAGE usage,
uint32 miscFlags,
uint32 stride,
uint32 alignment,
SBuffer* pBuffer,
ID3D11Buffer **ppBuffer
)

Helper function that creates a buffer for the shader (Constant buffer or StructuredBuffer)

Parameters
pDevice
ID3D11Device*

rendering device

bufSize
uint32

size of buffer in bytes

bindFlags
uint32

bind flags

cpuAccessFlags
uint32

access flags

usage
D3D11_USAGE

Usage model for buffer

pBuffer
SBuffer*

returns the created buffer

CreateConstantBuffer
void CShader::CreateConstantBuffer(
ID3D11Device *pDevice,
ShaderParamDef *pDefs,
uint32 paramsSize,
std::map<std::wstring, ShaderParamInstance> &params,
SBuffer *pConstantBuffer
)

CreateConstantBuffer creates the constant buffer (pixel or vertex shader)

Parameters
pDevice
ID3D11Device*

D3D device

pDefs
ShaderParamDef*

List of parameter definitions (parsed from HLSL)

paramsSize
uint32

Length of pDefs

params
std::map<std::wstring, ShaderParamInstance>&

Generated parameter list

ppBuffer

Returns the created constant buffer

Create
void CShader::Create(
IRenderer *pRenderer,

)

Name of shader

Shader description

pPSBlob
ID3DBlob*

pVSBlob
ID3DBlob*

Compiled binary for the vertex shader

pCSBlob
ID3DBlob*

Compiled binary for the compute shader
